headline: Mastercard Board of Directors Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: PURCHASE, N.Y., February 10, 2026--The Mastercard Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of 87 cents per share to be paid on May 8, 2026.

raw.headline: Mastercard Board of Directors Announces Quarterly Dividend
raw.summary: PURCHASE, N.Y., February 10, 2026--The Mastercard Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of 87 cents per share to be paid on May 8, 2026.

headline: Mastercard's Value-Added Services Boom in 2025: Buy, Hold or Sell?
summary: MA's value-added services drove strong growth in Q4 and 2025, but regulatory risks and growing competition cloud the outlook. Is MA a buy, hold or sell?

raw.headline: Mastercard's Value-Added Services Boom in 2025: Buy, Hold or Sell?
raw.summary: MA's value-added services drove strong growth in Q4 and 2025, but regulatory risks and growing competition cloud the outlook. Is MA a buy, hold or sell?

headline: Could the digital euro get a green light in 2026?
summary: The push for a digital euro has gained greater urgency as Europe seeks to bolster its financial sovereignty, with hopes the proposal will move forward this year after European lawmakers Tuesday backed the plans.There is renewed optimism that the European Parliament could really take that step this year after lawmakers on Tuesday expressed their support for the project.

raw.headline: Could the digital euro get a green light in 2026?
raw.summary: The push for a digital euro has gained greater urgency as Europe seeks to bolster its financial sovereignty, with hopes the proposal will move forward this year after European lawmakers Tuesday backed the plans.There is renewed optimism that the European Parliament could really take that step this year after lawmakers on Tuesday expressed their support for the project.

headline: EPI chief urges reduction in Europe’s dependence on Visa and Mastercard
summary: The remarks come as policymakers warn that the market dominance of US providers could be used as leverage if transatlantic relations were to worsen.

raw.headline: EPI chief urges reduction in Europe’s dependence on Visa and Mastercard
raw.summary: The remarks come as policymakers warn that the market dominance of US providers could be used as leverage if transatlantic relations were to worsen.

headline: Mastercard Agent Suite Launch Adds New Angle To AI Valuation Story
summary: Mastercard (NYSE:MA) has introduced Agent Suite, a new offering aimed at helping enterprises adopt agentic AI in their operations. The suite provides customizable AI agents and advisory services designed to support integration into areas such as customer support and commerce. For investors watching NYSE:MA, Agent Suite sits at the intersection of payments, data and artificial intelligence, an area that many banks and merchants are actively exploring. By focusing on AI agents tied to...
